title: Isekai Rakugo - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Male Protagonist   Transported to Another World   Weak Protagonist
author: Sujaku Shingo   朱雀新吾
description:
Great Sage Damaya who have been given the mission of saving the world by transporting a saviour from another world.

However, instead of a ‘Samurai’ or a ‘Ninja’ or anything, he mistakenly summoned a ‘Hanashika’.

This is a story about how a japanese storyteller, a Hanashika, saves the world using Rakugo.>
